units.name: Cozy Cottage
units.description: A charming cottage in the woods, perfect for a peaceful escape. This quaint unit offers a serene ambiance, surrounded by nature. Enjoy the rustic charm and relaxation.

units.name: Beachfront Villa
units.description: Luxurious villa with a view of the sea. Indulge in the lap of luxury and experience breathtaking ocean vistas from your private villa.

units.name: City Apartment
units.description: Modern apartment in the heart of the city, offering convenience and style. Explore the bustling metropolis from your comfortable urban retreat.

units.name: Mountain Cabin
units.description: Rustic cabin with a mountain view, ideal for nature enthusiasts. Enjoy the tranquility and scenic beauty of the mountains from this cozy retreat.

units.name: Lakeside Retreat
units.description: Tranquil retreat by the lake, perfect for relaxation and water activities. Revel in the peacefulness and scenic charm of the lakeside oasis.

units.name: Historic Mansion
units.description: Elegant mansion with a rich history, offering a taste of grandeur. Step back in time and experience the opulence of this historic gem.

units.name: Ski Chalet
units.description: Cozy chalet for winter sports enthusiasts. Embrace the winter wonderland and stay warm in this charming ski chalet at the ski resort.

units.name: Desert Oasis
units.description: A desert oasis with stunning views, perfect for experiencing the beauty of the desert. Explore the vast desert landscapes and enjoy a peaceful retreat.

units.name: Seaside Bungalow
units.description: Charming bungalow by the sea, offering a picturesque coastal experience. Wake up to the sound of waves in this cozy seaside haven.

units.name: Rural Farmhouse
units.description: Quaint farmhouse in the countryside, a perfect retreat from city life. Experience the simple charm and tranquility of the rural countryside.
